title: Shitposters of the Fediverse
description: Posters that primarily post jokes, likely with some level of internet-poisoned brain rot. (Some politics and other interests may be included) Many (but not all) are users who were/are on bluesky.

collected_by.note: (he/him) bidet and star trek enthusiast. certified cornball.

fields.name: header alt-text
fields.value: collage of posts: “I’m getting real close to muting Greg” “greg is the mouth piece of the bidet” “Don’t start with me, GREG” “OMG, GREG. You’re out of the fishing trip” “I can’t believe you Greg” “oh. my. god. GREG! WTH???
